title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received on a farewell visit His Excellency Cui Jianchun

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received on a farewell visit His Excellency Cui Jianchun, the outgoing Ambassador of China to Nigeria, today, 21st March, 2024.
The Honourable Minister and his guest extolled the excellent relations between Nigeria and China and recounted the many life changing projects brought about by the partnership. The Minister wished the Ambassador the very best in his future endeavours.
